rules.description: PLANCK + MOONLANDER Escape → Hyper Key (⌃⌥⇧⌘) (Escape if alone)
Mac Escape → Hyper Key (⌃⌥⇧⌘) (Escape if alone)
PLANCK + MOONLANDER open VS Code command palette
PLANCK + MOONLANDER highlight whole words forward
PLANCK + MOONLANDER highlight whole words backward
PLANCK + MOONLANDER highlight whole lines forward
PLANCK + MOONLANDER highlight whole lines backward
PLANCK + MOONLANDER [TERMINAL] jump to beginning of line
PLANCK + MOONLANDER [TERMINAL] jump to end of line
PLANCK + MOONLANDER jump to beginning of line
PLANCK + MOONLANDER jump to end of line
